original_text: And the people of Israel went up against the people of Benjamin on the third day and set themselves in array against Gibeah, as at other times.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 셋째 날에 베냐민 자손을 치러 올라가서 전과 같이 기브아에 맞서 전열을 갖추매

sentences.original_text: And the people of Israel went up against the people of Benjamin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 백성은 베냐민 백성을 치러 올라갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and set themselves in array against Gibeah
